text: Egha me ghua Balhasorɨn nguibamɨn otivigha, Apsalom uan ingangarir gumaziba pamten me abɨra me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia isamɨn torimɨn gantɨ, Amnon dɨpar onganiba amegh onganightɨ, kɨ mɨkɨmvɨra ikɨtɨ, ia a mɨsueghtɨ a irɨgh aremegh. Kɨ uabɨ a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa ia mɨgɨa ia abɨra. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigh bizitamɨn atiatingan markɨ.”
